message.content: {"given_definition_quality":90,"better_definition":"to attend class or to give a class/lesson","sentence":"我们上课。","image_prompt":"Show a futuristic, slightly ruined but clean classroom during a soft apocalypse. Several children and a teacher are sitting at desks, as if in the middle of a lesson. The classroom has large broken windows with light streaming in, some green plants creeping inside, soft pastel colors, and subtle technological elements like a glowing screen. All people look hopeful and calm. The overall tone is gentle and animated, blending hope and endings.","sentence_translation":"We have class."}
